name: raddictive
description:
• Draw lines to direct where the balls go
  • Match colors to increase score
  • Collect points also. Collecting all points in a group will enter into the Bonus Stage, and this is where the serious scoring is done!
  • Hit the Freeze button (also Space bar) if things get bad
  • You can tap and drag balls

I'm looking for any feedback before I launch this on mobile. 

Known Issues

  • No online leader boards (They are in Android version)
  • No music
